name: C.O.N.T.R.O.L
description:
Welcome to the C.O.N.T.R.O.L experiment.

Your mission is to finish all the chambers to test your C.O.N.T.R.O.L  

Controls: 

use arrows or AWSD to Move.
Press CTRL then select the robot you would like to control. you can move a robot one step per CONTROL. 
if you're stuck press R to Restart
